dsp.title: Tsement-qum ohak / shpal
dsp.description: Tsement-qumli ohak va zamin qoplamasi uchun materiallarni hisoblash

exterior_siding.title: Siding (PVX / metall / tolali tsement)
exterior_siding.description: Materialni hisoblash: Siding (PVX / metall / tolali tsement)

concrete_universal.title: Universal beton
concrete_universal.description: Beton hajmini va aralashtirish uchun materiallarni hisoblash

paint.title: Universal bo'yoq
paint.description: Devor va shiftlar uchun bo'yoqlarni hisoblash

partitions_blocks.title: Gazlangan beton / ko'pikli blok
partitions_blocks.description: Materialni hisoblash: Gazlangan beton / ko'pikli blok

walls_wallpaper.title: Rapport bilan fon rasmi
walls_wallpaper.description: Materialni hisoblash: Rapport bilan fon rasmi

walls_gkl.title: GKL devor qoplamasi
walls_gkl.description: Profillar, gipsokarton plitalari va devor qoplamasi uchun mahkamlagichlarni hisoblash

error.save_calculation: Hisob-kitobni loyihaga saqlashda xatolik yuz berdi

before.measure: To'g'ri hisoblash uchun sirt maydonini diqqat bilan o'lchang
before.mix_choice: M300 (qum-beton) - pollar uchun, M150 - devorlar uchun
before.thin_screed: ⚠ 30 mm dan yupqa qatlam yorilishi mumkin. Yupqa qatlamlar uchun o'z-o'zidan tekislash birikmasidan foydalaning

after.curing: Screed 28 kun davomida kuchga ega bo'ladi. Dastlabki 7 kun davomida sirtni namlang
after.temperature: +5 ° C dan + 30 ° C gacha haroratda ishlang
after.crack_warning: ⚠ Ogohlantirish: juda yupqa qatlam yoriqlarga olib kelishi mumkin
after.reinforcement: Qavatlar uchun tavsiya etilgan 100x100 mm mustahkamlovchi mash

before.primer: Bo'yashdan oldin har doim primerdan foydalaning

after.apply: Bo'yoqni rulon yoki purkagich bilan teng ravishda qo'llang
after.drying: Har bir qatlamni to'liq quritishga ruxsat bering (4-6 soat)

input.mix_type.hint: Ish turiga qarab aralashtirish darajasini tanlang
input.bag_weight.hint: Bir sumkaning kilogrammdagi og'irligi (odatda 25, 40 yoki 50 kg)
input.consumption.hint: Bir qatlamda 1 m² uchun bo'yoq iste'moli

tip.title: UI maslahati
tip.body: Mos almashinuvni davom ettirish uchun rejimlar orasida AnimatedCrossFade-dan foydalaning. Agar siz bir vaqtning o'zida butun kvartirani hisoblashingiz kerak bo'lsa, "Xona qo'shish" tugmasini qo'shing.

search.try_another_query: Boshqa soʻrovni sinab koʻring. Masalan: "beton", "devor qog'ozi", "plitka"
